All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthService
Service class responsible for handling user authentication logic.
ErrorResponse
DTO representing error information returned by the backend API.
HttpRequestUtil
Utility class for sending HTTP requests to the backend API.
LocalDateTimeAdapter
Gson TypeAdapter for serializing and deserializing LocalDateTime objects to and from ISO-8601 strings.
Main
Entry point for the TV Tracker CLI application.
Menu
CLI menu for the TV Tracker application.
ShowResponse
DTO representing a TV show object returned by the backend.
ShowService
Service class responsible for retrieving and displaying TV show data.
UserRequest
Represents the payload for user registration requests.
UserService
Service class for handling user-related operations, such as registration.
UserWatchHistoryRequest
DTO used for sending a user's watch status for a specific show to the backend.
UserWatchHistoryResponse
DTO representing a TV show that a user has added to their personal watch history.
UserWatchHistoryService
Service class for managing user watch history operations.
WatchStatus
Enum representing the watch status of a TV show from the user's perspective.
